name: SHOOTING IRON
description:
Explore the Canyon and fight against Crooks in this Cowboy themed platformer game, where you are connected to your bullets.

This game was created within two days as a part of the GMTK game jam 2021, with the theme being Joined Together.

How to play:

W,A,S,D - Move Player

LeftClick - ShootBullet

Mouse - Aim

Spacebar - Jump/Respawn

R-Key - Reload
